name: Hydra Chain is coming
description:
HYDRA CHAIN
Permissionless, Inflationary POS blockchain with fixed fiat transaction fees and a unique burning mechanism on the generated transactional economy
Key Features:
🔥 100% Burn of all Transaction Fees
💎 50% Royalty on Gas for Smart Contract Creators
📌 Fixed Coin Transaction Fees of $0.20
📌 Fixed Token Transaction Fees of $0.50
💰 20% Minimum APR Staking Income
📈 Up to 540 TPS Elastic Capacity
🔏 EVM Compatible Smart Contract Platform
⚙️ Wallet-Level Scalability
🗳 Unique Decentralized Governance Protocol
⚖️ 18.5M Starting Supply with a unique approach for handling the deflation tipping point.
Projects currently on Hydrachain:
LockTrip - is a blockchain-based travel marketplace that allows users to save up to 60% on their bookings - www.locktrips.com Use code CYRRG for special 5% off - Objkt users.
GoMeat - is a digital marketplace connecting consumers with specialty (halal & kosher) meat, grocery and restaurants. - www.gomeat.io
Evedo is a blockchain based platform, consisting of B2B & B2C Marketplaces. www.evedo.co
Rezchain - is the hotel distribution industry’s first functioning blockchain enabled technology platform. www.rezchain.com
Hydra DEX - is the native decentralized exchange of Hydra chain - in development
ChangeX - Next Generation Composable DeFi - www.changex.io - ICO stage.
